Subject: Announcement: Company Holiday/Wellness Day

Dear Team,

I am pleased to announce that our company will be observing a company holiday/wellness day on [date]. This day is meant to provide our employees with an opportunity to rest and recharge, promoting overall well-being and work-life balance.

During this day, all employees are encouraged to take time to relax and engage in activities that promote physical, mental, and emotional wellness. Whether you choose to spend time with family, engage in a hobby, or simply take a day to unwind, we hope that you will make the most of this opportunity to prioritize your well-being.

Please note that essential services will still be available on this day, and employees who are required to work will be compensated accordingly.

We understand the importance of taking time for self-care and are committed to supporting our employees in maintaining a healthy work-life balance. Thank you for your hard work and dedication to our company, and we hope you enjoy this upcoming holiday/wellness day.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
